findings.title: Missing event record
findings.description: The following functions do not log events.

findings.title: Safe transfer issue
findings.description: Use transferFrom in the claim function to transfer the token. If the token in the operation does not meet the eip20 standard, the transaction may fail.

findings.title: Risk of excessive authority
findings.description: The owner has too much authority. If the owner's private key is leaked, the attacker can manipulate the price by setting setRates and setFixedPrice, withdraw the revenue in the contract, or set a malicious Oracle contract through setOracleAddress to control the price.
